summary: Eight strangers go into a locked room for clinical trials on a new drug that gives them superpowers.
cast: Paul O'Brien|Charlotte Nicdao|Emily Wheaton|Spencer McLaren|Paul Henri|Katharine Innes|Frank Magree|Tosh Greenslade|Paris Culbertson|Luke D'Emanuele|Josef Gatti|Abbe Holmes|Dylan Jones|Robert Mond|Pip Mushin|Ron-Solo|Tim Smart
title: The Subjects
